Html:
Club Starter kit 2.0

I created a new role called Users. I want Users able to create/edit News, Forums, Blogs, and Upload Pictures.
I configured web.config as the following:

<location path="photo/new.aspx">
<system.web>
<authorization>
<allow roles="Administrators"/>
<allow roles="Users"/>
<deny users="*"/>
</authorization>
</system.web>
</location>

and so on....

The site load fine but doesn't give any create/edit permissions.
I also tried ASP.NET configuration tool and allow Users access permission to folders such as News, Forums, and Photos but it still doesn't work.

Can anyone help me with this? Thanks
